fields.request: Manual QA: Verify RFID scanner starts after suite is ready
fields.request_details: Restart the suite on a control node with RFID hardware enabled so the control.lck and rfid.lck files exist. During migrations and startup, confirm the logs no longer show repeated 'RFID hardware setup failed; background reader not running' entries and that RFID checks do not block startup. Once the UI is available, open the Scan RFIDs admin action from the RFID changelist (admin > Core > RFIDs > "Scan RFIDs") and trigger a scan or present a tag. Verify the background reader initializes successfully after the suite is up and the scan UI responds without new errors.
